summary: Adds white and black horses to Skyrim, replacing the ones at Markath\'s and Windhelm\'s stables.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [IMG]http://i490.photobucket.com/albums/rr267/TLK_Tari/logomitad.png[/IMG]

This mod replaces the horses at Markath\'s stables with white horses, and the Windhelm ones with black horses. 

[color={red}]{Install: Extract the \'Data\' folder into Skyrim\'s main directory.}[/color]

[color={red}]{Uninstall: Delete the \'horse\' folder in Data\\Textures\\Actors..}[/color] 

[b] == UPDATE ==  [/b]

Uploaded an eye fix for the black horse that replaces the current yellow demonic eyes.


If you have any horse color/breed request, feel free to post it at the mod\'s forum section. 

~VP [/center]
author: Vp007
